analysis.description:
Reentrancy in OKFCrowdsale.purchase (/unique_chucks/27/0x51db62d862314d036797c8ae897011dadb8256ce.sol#217-261):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(token.transfer(msg.sender,amount)) (/unique_chucks/27/0x51db62d862314d036797c8ae897011dadb8256ce.sol#237-238)
	External calls sending eth:
	- require(bool)(msg.sender.send(retSum)) (/unique_chucks/27/0x51db62d862314d036797c8ae897011dadb8256ce.sol#237)
	- require(bool)(beneficiary.send(sum.div(100).mul(90))) (/unique_chucks/27/0x51db62d862314d036797c8ae897011dadb8256ce.sol#239-241)
	- require(bool)(command.send(sum.sub(sum.div(100).mul(90)))) (/unique_chucks/27/0x51db62d862314d036797c8ae897011dadb8256ce.sol#241-242)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokensSold (/unique_chucks/27/0x51db62d862314d036797c8ae897011dadb8256ce.sol#253-255)

Reentrancy in OKFCrowdsale.withdraw (/unique_chucks/27/0x51db62d862314d036797c8ae897011dadb8256ce.sol):
	External calls:
	- token.transfer(beneficiary,token.balanceOf(this)) (/unique_chucks/27/0x51db62d862314d036797c8ae897011dadb8256ce.sol)
	- token.transferOwnership(beneficiary) (/unique_chucks/27/0x51db62d862314d036797c8ae897011dadb8256ce.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- crowdsaleFinished (/unique_chucks/27/0x51db62d862314d036797c8ae897011dadb8256ce.sol)

OKFCrowdsale.withdraw (/unique_chucks/27/0x51db62d862314d036797c8ae897011dadb8256ce.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(beneficiary,token.balanceOf(this)) (/unique_chucks/27/0x51db62d862314d036797c8ae897011dadb8256ce.sol)
